name: The Cabin (itch) (mattj375)
description:
You play as a detective investigating a cabin that has turned up in a murder investigation. Little did you know, that upon entering, the murderer was still inside and has locked you inside! Try to escape before he manages to make you his next victim.

A point-and-click adventure game created with students at Protege Game Studios, of which I oversaw the puzzle design and built the engine code from scratch.

If you pause the game, you can access a full walkthrough if you get stuck on any of the puzzles (revealed incrementally). If you happen to lose, you can always retry from where you left off.
